name: Ramadan Fasting
description:
Hey there!
Have you ever wondered how Muslims fast during Ramadan? You didn't? Well, this game won't answer that anyway!
This small game is about fasting and avoiding food thoughts.

Keep your health bar (Red bar) up by eating healthy food.
Keep your will bar (Green bar) up by spending (Or technically shooting) your energy toward the Quran that pops!
Your energy bar (Yellow bar) is your energy, it can be filled by eating food after fasting ends.

If your red or green bar empties out you lose.

Hope you enjoy the game and fast as many days as you think you can!

Controls:

Movement = WASD
Shooting/Aim = Mouse

This game was made for Ramadan Jam (Theme: Clock is Ticking)
